posts.post_content:
Two T206 Hall of Famers for sale or available for trade:
 
1) Chance, Portrait Red Background, Sweet Caporal 150/30, SGC 40 - no creases or paper loss, just corner wear. $130.00 delivered.
 
2) McGraw, Glove on Hip, Piedmont 350-460/25, SGC 40 - has light corner crease in upper left which is barely visible in the attached scan, otherwise a very attractive card (nice corners, good color and a clean back). I can provide a higher resolution scan upon request. $100.00 delivered.
 
First person to send an e-mail to [URL="sschris@att.net"]sschris@att.net[/URL] committing to make purchase ("I'll take it") is the new owner. Good luck!
 
Thanks,
Steve C.

Bump for price reductions. Also now accepting trade offers for T206s in similar condition (raw or graded; raw prefered if not trimmed and no paper loss). 
 
Thanks.
